title: Nova Scotia to grant temporary release to some inmates amid COVID   pandemic
description: Nova Scotia is releasing   people serving intermittent sentences in provincial jails in an effort to mitigate the spread of COVID
content: Nova Scotia is granting temporary release to some inmates during the COVID   pandemic to mitigate the virus s spread within jails The province announced Wednesday it would grant temporary absences  with no fixed end date  to   people serving intermittent     chars
